quest.name: Streets of Moonfire (Limsa Lominsa)
journal:
An adventurer without a guild is no adventurer at all, and one chaperone of the Moonfire Faire is determined that you should do your part.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.

According to a roving chaperone of the Moonfire Faire, the Adventurers' Guild is looking for members willing to help with the festivities. As a proud guildswomanguildsman and something of a sartorial adventurer, it would behoove you to slip on a red lady's yukatablue lord's yukata and take yourself to the Aftcastle. If the chief chaperone, Haermaga, is all that he is promised to be, this transaction would prove to be in your favor.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.

Haermaga is a trifle vague on the rationale of these festivities, but quite clear on the matter of reward. In return for participating in three events, you will receive prizes, plus a special costume. Your summer wardrobe is a little lacking, and it would be well for the commonfolk to see what an adventurer is made of. And if that should prove insufficient motivation, do it for the children.
objectives: Don a lady's yukata (red)lord's yukata (blue) and speak with Haermaga.

dialogue.name: EXABU01535
dialogue.text: Psst, adventurer! Aye, you, who else would I be talking to? If you call yourself an adventurer, you'd better come help out with the Moonfire Faire.

dialogue.name: EXABU01535
dialogue.text: Have you heard of the faire? It has its origins in the Bombard hunts we started five years ago. Fire, dancing, incineration─what's not to love?

dialogue.name: EXABU01535
dialogue.text: But the faire isn't just about demons. As a matter of fact, there aren't any Bombards about this year. No, this year, we're going to show the folk that adventurers aren't just about making funny faces at Bombards and carting around ashes.

dialogue.name: EXABU01535
dialogue.text: Are you with me? You're with me! Well, go on up to that big lummox over there. That's Chief Chaperone Haermaga.

dialogue.name: EXABU01535
dialogue.text: But not dressed like that, you don't. Put on a red lady's yukatablue lord's yukata first, else how's Haermaga to know that you're serious about helping?

dialogue.name: EXABU01535
dialogue.text: Don't have one of those? Well, worry not! I bought mine from one of the Moonfire Faire vendors for a modest enough sum. You'll also get a new set of garb later for helping.

dialogue.name: EXABU01535
dialogue.text: If you want to help with the Moonfire Faire, go talk to Chief Chaperone Haermaga right over there. Don't forget to wear your red lady's yukatablue lord's yukata so he knows what you're about.

dialogue.name: EXABU01535
dialogue.text: You can buy a yukata from any Moonfire Faire vendor. It won't set you back very much, so don't be such a gil–pincher!

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: So! You're here to muck in and churn it up for the Moonfire Faire? That's the spirit─the adventuring spirit! Come to think of it, that's what the festivities are about, isn't it?

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: The adventuring trade has a─hang my tongue─has a figuring problem, see? The commonfolk can't figure out what we do, beyond doing that hither, doing this thither.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: What we need's a real adventurer living by the sweat of herhis brow, showing everyone how it's done! And what we do! You know, mucking in, living it up! Making it real!

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: What else? Oh! It's about the children. I don't rightly remember why, but it's about the children. Because...because they grow up, that's right. Where would the guild be without the next generation? Getting old, that's where we'd be. Don't know about you, but I'm not spending my golden years crafting ingots!

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: So we figured─or one of the other chaperones figured, I don't go to all the meetings─there should be three adventuring events. There's a prize for each one, and we'd be extra appreciative if you do all three!

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: So, ah, you ready to do this? If you are, I'll show you where you can find the events!

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: Er, you want to help with the Moonfire Faire? Where's your yukata? You're supposed to be wearing one of those─they told me that was decided at the meeting. Sorry, no exceptions!

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: But I'm a helpful sort of fellow. I'm the chief chaperone here, after all! You can buy a red lady's yukatablue lord's yukata from any Moonfire Faire vendor. Then you'll be ready to muck in and do your bit for the guild!
